subject: Economy
question_en: What is the official language of India?
question_hi: भारत के अधिकारी भाषा क्या है।
explanation_en: Hindi is the official language of India.
explanation_hi: भारत की अधिकारी भाषा हिंदी है।

subject: Economy
question_en: What is the definition of unemployment?
A_en: The labor force not currently employed or actively seeking employment.
B_en: Unpaid family work is not considered as unemployment
